data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vétek, Gábor, Papp, Veronika, Haltrich, Attila, Rédei, Dávid (2014): First record of the brown marmorated stink bug, Halyomorpha halys (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae), in Hungary, with description of the genitalia of both sexes. Zootaxa 3780 (1): 194-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.1.8
